forecast.wind: Northerly or variable 1 to 3, occasionally 4, becoming westerly 3 to 5 during the morning, perhaps locally 6 mid-channel later.
forecast.sea: Smooth or slight with a low swell, increasing moderate to rather rough in the northwest later.
forecast.weather: Occasional rain overnight, perhaps locally heavy, clearing by mid-morning.
forecast.visibility: Good, occasionally moderate, perhaps locally poor.
